title: Doubling Time of Human Population from 2018

content.question: Human population growth in 2018 was <math alttext="1.07%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.07</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>. If this rate of growth remains constant, in what year will the human population double?

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
